formName: Gas for use as road fuel
description: Fill in your gas for use as road fuel return form online

sections.title: Enter the time period for this return
Enter your business details
sections.description: This is your registered business address. We will ask you later about additional sites for this return.

fields.label: Select nil return if you have no duty to pay this return period.
choices: Submit a return with payment due

fields.title: Enter number of sites
fields.description: Tell us how many sites are you including in this return.

fields.title: Enter duty detail for sdfv
fields.description: Tell us about each site name or location and the duty due on gas sent out, set aside or used as road fuel.
